title: Navaratna Diamond Stud Earrings - Sampoorna Shubhakar
materials: 22K Gold (Sona) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features nine precious gemstones (Navaratnas) including Ruby (Manikyam)
and Cat's Eye (Lehsuniya). Diamonds are of VS clarity and G color.
features: Circular stud design featuring the Navaratnas in a radiating arrangement around a central Ruby. Set within an intricate micro-pav√© setting of brilliant-cut diamonds, creating a starburst effect. Expertly crafted with attention to detail showcasing traditional gem placement and modern diamond setting techniques. The back is smooth for comfortable wear.
colors: Predominantly gold with a vibrant palette of gemstone colors: deep red (Ruby)
and shimmering cat's eye green (Cat's Eye).
occasions: Ideal for auspicious occasions like weddings (Vivahalu)
and other celebratory events. Also suitable for adding a touch of traditional elegance to modern formal wear.
description: A harmonious blend of tradition and luxury, these Navaratna stud earrings are believed to bring good fortune, health, and prosperity to the wearer. The meticulous craftsmanship and high-quality gemstones make this a timeless heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting sheen and brilliance. The combination of Navaratnas and diamonds amplifies the jewelry's aesthetic appeal and metaphysical benefits.
